summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated March 30, 2010. The email discusses a request for a meeting or call at a specific time, while also containing a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and intended only for the recipient.

Jeffrey Epstein requests a meeting or call at a specific time.
